maml:description.maml:para: Adds a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Assignment Job

The Add-AzWorkspaceManagerAssignmentJobs command adds a Workspace Manager Assignment Job to the workspace. By default the name of the Workspace Manager Assignment is the same as the Workspace Manager Group.
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment. This is the same as the Workspace Manager GroupName unless specified otherwise
{{ Fill ResourceId Description }}
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment. This is the same as the Workspace Manager GroupName unless specified otherwise
{{ Fill ResourceId Description }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example adds a Workspace Manager Assignment Job to the workspace 'MyWorkspace' with the name 'MyWorkspaceManagerAssignment'
This example adds a Workspace Manager Assignment Job to the workspace 'MyWorkspace' in the resourcegroup 'MyResourceGroup' with the name 'MyWorkspaceManagerAssignment'
This example adds a Workspace Manager Assignment Job to the workspace 'MyWorkspace' for each Workspace Manager Assignment found

maml:description.maml:para: Adds a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Assignment

The Add-AzWorkspaceManagerAssignments command adds a Workspace Manager Assignment to a Workspace Manager Group. These assignments are used to provision Microsoft Sentinel workspaces. The Workspace Manager Assignment name is constructed by the GroupName. The resource id's of the items that are added to the assignment are stored in the properties of the assignment. These resources need to be in the same instance as the workspace manager configuration. If the resource id's are not in the same instance as the workspace manager configuration, the assignment will not be created and an error will be thrown.
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager group
The name of the workspace manager assignment
The ResourceId's of the items that to be added to the Workspace Manager Assignment. This can be a single value or an array of values.
The name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager group
The name of the workspace manager assignment
The ResourceId's of the items that to be added to the Workspace Manager Assignment. This can be a single value or an array of values.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example adds a Workspace Manager Assignment to the workspace with the name 'AlertRules' and assigns this to the group 'myGroup'.
This example adds a Workspace Manager Assignment to the workspace with the name 'AlertRules' and assigns this to the group 'myGroup' and adds the alert rule to the assignment.
This example gets all the alert rules from the workspace with the name 'myWorkspace' and adds these to the Workspace Manager Assignment with the name 'AlertRules'.

maml:description.maml:para: Add a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Group.

The Add-AzWorkspaceManagerGroups cmdlet adds a workspace manager group to the configuration. It is possible to add child workspaces to the group or add them later. For adding child workspaces, use the Add-AzWorkspaceManagerMembers cmdlet.
The Name of the log analytics workspace.
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located.
The name of the workspace manager group.
The description of the workspace manager group. If not specified, the name will be used.
The workspace manager members to add to the group. The members are workspaces that are linked to the workspace manager configuration. and used to provision Microsoft Sentinel workspaces.
{{ Fill ResourceId Description }}
The Name of the log analytics workspace.
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located.
The name of the workspace manager group.
The description of the workspace manager group. If not specified, the name will be used.
The workspace manager members to add to the group. The members are workspaces that are linked to the workspace manager configuration. and used to provision Microsoft Sentinel workspaces.
{{ Fill ResourceId Description }}

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example adds a Workspace Manager Group 'Banks' to the workspace and adds a child workspace to the group.
This example adds a Workspace Manager Group 'Banks' to the workspace and adds all child workspaces to the group using the pipeline.

maml:description.maml:para: Add a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Member

The Add-AzWorkspaceManagerMembers cmdlet adds a workspace manager member to the configuration. These members are workspaces that are linked to the workspace manager configuration. and used to provision Microsoft Sentinel workspaces. The Workspace Manager Member name is constructed as follows: <workspaceName>(<subscriptionId>)
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The ResourceId of the target workspace to add as a member
The TenantId of the target workspace to add as a member
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The ResourceId of the target workspace to add as a member
The TenantId of the target workspace to add as a member

maml:alert.maml:para: The Workspace Manager Member name is constructed as follows: <workspaceName>(<subscriptionId>)

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example adds a Workspace Manager Member for the workspace with the name 'myWorkspace' and adds the workspace with the name 'myChildWorkspace' as a member.
PS > Add-AzWorkspaceManagerMembers -WorkspaceName "myWorkspace" -ResourceId $resourceIds -TenantId " * "
This example adds a multiple Members from from an array into the workspace manager with the name 'myWorkspace'

maml:description.maml:para: Gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager

The Get-AzWorkspaceManager cmdlet retrieves a Workspace Manager Configuration from the Log Analytics workspace. You can retrieve the workspace manager configuration by using just provding a workspacename. Only one workspace manager configuration can be added per Microsoft Sentinel instance
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located

dev:remarks.maml:para: This command gets the workspace manager for the workspace 'myWorkspace'

This command gets the workspace manager for the workspace 'myWorkspace' in resource group 'myRg' Specifying the resource group is only needed if multiple workspaces with the same name are available in the subscription.

maml:description.maml:para: Get the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Groups

The Get-AzWorkspaceManagerAssignmentJobs cmdlet gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Assignment Jobs It can be used to get all the Workspace Manager Assignment Jobs or a specific Workspace Manager Assignment Job by specifying the JobName.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment (default this has the same value as the Workspace Manager GroupName)
The name of the Workspace Manager Assignment Job
{{ Fill ResourceId Description }}
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment (default this has the same value as the Workspace Manager GroupName)
The name of the Workspace Manager Assignment Job
{{ Fill ResourceId Description }}
Get the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Groups

The Get-AzWorkspaceManagerAssignments cmdlet gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Assignments by just specifying the workspace name When the workspace manager configuration is not 'Enabled' for the workspace, the cmdlet will return an information message If a Name is specified, the cmdlet will return the details of the workspace manager assignment
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example gets all the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Assignments for the workspace 'MyWorkspace'
This example gets the details of the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Assignment 'MyWorkspaceManagerAssignment' for the workspace 'MyWorkspace'

maml:description.maml:para: Get the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Groups

The Get-AzWorkspaceManagerGroups cmdlet gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Groups by just specifying the workspace name or by specifying the workspace name and the resource group name. The return value contains the details of the workspace manager groups including the members. If no workspace manager groups are found, the cmdlet returns an information message. If the workspace manager configuration is not enabled, the cmdlet returns an information message.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager group
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager group

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Groups for the workspace 'MyWorkspace'
This example gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Groups for the workspace 'MyWorkspace' in the resource group 'MyResourceGroup'
This example gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Group 'MyWorkspaceManagerGroup' for the workspace 'MyWorkspace'
This example gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Groups for the workspace 'MyWorkspace' using the pipeline

maml:description.maml:para: Gets a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Member

The Get-AzWorkspaceManagerItems is a helper command to get the resource ids of Microsoft Sentinel resources that can be added to assignments Currently only three types of resources are supported: AlertRules, AutomationRules and SavedSearches. When using SavedSearches, the Name parameter This command currently not supports pipeline input and is still in development. is ignored due to API limitations.
Enter the Name of the log analytics workspace
Enter the name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Enter the name of the resource to get
Select the type of resource to get. Currently only AlertRules, AutomationRules and SavedSearches are supported
Enter the Name of the log analytics workspace
Enter the name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Enter the name of the resource to get
Select the type of resource to get. Currently only AlertRules, AutomationRules and SavedSearches are supported

maml:alert.maml:para: This command currently not supports pipeline input and is still in development.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example gets the resource id of the AlertRule 'MyAlertRule' in the log analytics workspace 'MyWorkspace' in the resource group 'MyResourceGroup'
This example gets the resource ids of all AlertRules in the log analytics workspace 'MyWorkspace' in the resource group 'MyResourceGroup'
This example gets the resource ids of all SavedSearches in the log analytics workspace 'MyWorkspace' in the resource group 'MyResourceGroup'
This example gets the resource ids of all AutomationRules in the log analytics workspace 'MyWorkspace' in the resource group 'MyResourceGroup'

maml:description.maml:para: Gets a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Member

The Get-AzWorkspaceManagerMembers cmdlet gets workspace manager member(s) from the configuration. If the workspace manager member name is not provided, all the workspace manager members for the workspace will be returned. When the workspace manager member name is provided, the workspace manager member details will be returned.
Enter the Name of the log analytics workspace
Enter the name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Enter the name of the workspace manager member
Enter the Name of the log analytics workspace
Enter the name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Enter the name of the workspace manager member

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Members for the workspace 'MyWorkspace'
This example gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Members for the workspace 'MyWorkspace' in the resource group 'myResourceGroup'
This example gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Member 'myChildWorkspace( * )' for the workspace 'MyWorkspace'
This example gets the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Members for the workspace 'MyWorkspace' using pipeline

maml:description.maml:para: Remove Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager

The Remove-AzWorkspaceManager cmdlet retrieves a Workspace Manager Configuration and removes it from the Log Analytics workspace. You can remove the workspace manager configuration by just providing a workspacename.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Confirms the removal of the Workspace manager configuration.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Confirms the removal of the Workspace manager configuration.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

This command removes the workspace manager on the Sentinel workspace 'myWorkspace' without confirmation'
This command removes the workspace manager based on a pipeline value from the Get-AzWorkspaceManager cmdlet

maml:description.maml:para: Get the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Groups

The Remove-AzWorkspaceManagerAssignmentJobs cmdlet removes the Workspace Manager Assignment Jobs from the Workspace Manager Assignment. When the Workspace Manager Assignment is removed, all the Workspace Manager Assignment Jobs are removed as well.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The name of the workspace manager assignment (default this has the same value as the Workspace Manager GroupName)

maml:description.maml:para: Remove Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager Assignment

The Remove-AzWorkspaceManagerAssignments cmdlet removes a Workspace Manager Assignment from a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace. The cmdlet will not return an error if the Workspace Manager Assignment does not exist. The Assignment must first be removed from the Workspace Manager Group before the group can be removed.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The Name of the Workspace Manager Assignment

Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

The Name of the Workspace Manager Assignment

maml:description.maml:para: Remove Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Manager

This command removes a Workspace Manager Group from a Microsoft Sentinel Workspace. If the Workspace Manager Group does not exist, the command will return an error. When the Workspace Manager Group is removed the members of the group will no longer receive updates from the workspace. If an assigment is still available for the group, the group cannot be removed.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The Name of the Workspace Manager Group
Confirms the removal of the Workspace manager configuration.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Name of the log analytics workspace
The name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
The Name of the Workspace Manager Group
Confirms the removal of the Workspace manager configuration.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

This example removes all Workspace Manager Groups from the workspace 'myWorkspace' without prompting for confirmation using the pipeline

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a Workspace Manager Configuration

The Set-AzWorkspaceManager cmdlet creates a Workspace Manager Configuration that is required to use workspace manager feature. You can create a workspace manager configuration by using just a workspacename. The minimum requirement to to enable the workspace manager is that Microsoft Sentinel is enabled on the Log Analytics workspace. Only one workspace manager configuration can be added per Microsoft Sentinel instance.
Name of the log analytics workspace
Name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Status of the Workspace Manager (Enabled or Disabled)
Name of the log analytics workspace
Name of the ResouceGroup where the log analytics workspace is located
Status of the Workspace Manager (Enabled or Disabled)

dev:remarks.maml:para: Name : myWorkspace ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/<REDACTED>/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations/myWorkspace Tags : Properties : @{mode=Enabled}
This command creates / enables the workspace manager on the Sentinel workspace 'myWorkspace'

Name : myWorkspace ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/<REDACTED>/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations/myWorkspace Tags : Properties : @{mode=Disabled}
This command sets the workspace manager to disabled

Name : myWorkspace ResourceGroupName : myRG ResourceType : Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations WorkspaceName : myWorkspace ResourceId : /subscriptions/<REDACTED>/resourceGroups/myRG/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/myWorkspace/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/workspaceManagerConfigurations/myWorkspace Tags : Properties : @{mode=Enabled}

This command enables the workspace manager for the workspace 'myWorkspace' in resource group 'myRg' Specifying the resource group is only needed if multiple workspaces with the same name are available in the subscription.
